title: Your favorite champion just woke up in Vegas, and finds they have no memory of the last 24 hours.
body:
What happened during their drunken escapades? Post their story below!
Examples: 
{{champion:32}}: Wha... what happened? 
{{champion:51}}: Police! Open up!
{{champion:32}}: Can I help you officer?
{{champion:51}}: You are under arrest for the murder of Annie Hastur.
{{champion:32}}: But I wouldn't murder Annie?!? She is my only friend!
{{champion:51}} Witnesses say you wouldn't stop singing "Annie are you okay? You okay? You okay Annie" while dancing through the streets. When the child tried to stop you, you thew a tantrum and killed her in front of everyone.
{{champion:32}}: I DID?!? Now I am alone again *sobs*
{{champion:51}} I guess you could say (*puts on sunglasses*), that you don't have Annie-one.
{{champion:254}} YEEEEAAAAAAAAAH!

replies.body:
{{champion:90}} Oh my head...what did I do last night? And who bed am I in?

{{champion:421}} *purr*

{{champion:90}} ....oh dear god.

Rek'Sai is a true lady.
http://i.imgur.com/CwBoIn1.jpg
But not when she is drunk.

When she is drunk she does this to people:
http://championfoundation.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/Car-in-Sinkhole.jpg
{{champion:38}} WTF did I just read
Void fan-fiction

_Aftermath of a girls' night out..._

{{champion:22}} "...my head feels like Sejuani's boar stomped on it..."
{{champion:127}} "He did, I think."
{{champion:113}} "Heehee, tha's a good...  Wait, where *is* Bristle?"
{{champion:201}} "He is sleeping."
{{champion:22}} "Wait, Braum, what are you doing here?  This was supposed to be our night out!"
{{champion:201}} "Someone had to help out, save you girls from your own foolishness!  Sejuani, I am disappointed!  You should know better than to drink and ride!  You smashed three cars then crashed your boar into a Burger King!"
{{champion:113}} "I _will_ rule the Freljord, no burger king will stand in _my_ way..."
{{champion:201}} "Here is some warm milk, go lie down, you're still drunk."
{{champion:113}} "Whatever you say, *dad.*"
{{champion:127}} "What could I have possibly done?"
{{champion:201}} "You!  You dressed up as Queen Elsa and crashed a Disney on Ice show, flinging ice everywhere while giggling like a schoolgirl and singing something about snowmen."
{{champion:127}} "Oh Gods, how...  cliche..."
{{champion:22}} *Laughs*  "That's horrible!  ...Wait, do I even want to know what I did?"
{{champion:201}} "Well, it involved a very tiny outfit, your bow, and some-"
{{champion:23}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:79}}  *Raucous laughter from the next room*
{{champion:79}} "*DAT ASHE GIRL!*"
{{champion:24}} "Imagine if you had a *real* pole!"
{{champion:22}} "*...I'M GONNA F@#KING KILL YOU TRYNDAMERE!*"
Good Guy Braum is here to save them!

{{champion:21}} ...uhh what happened 
{{champion:21}}  where am i
{{champion:41}} at my home 
{{champion:21}} aww ****
{{champion:41}} HAR HAR HAR
Actually according to lore the roles would probably be switched...
except GP would never wake up without his memory of the past day because he ate oranges and it was k.

{{champion:157}}  *texts {{champion:40}} * Hey that was fun last night, but i dont remember half of the night, we both got really drunk, huh? Do you remember anything about it?
*No Response*
{{champion:157}} *turns on the news* "Freak tornado in downtown Zaun last night, hundreds of people caught unawares. Several dozen serious injuries although thankfully no deaths...."
{{champion:157}} ..... Time to move again.

{{champion:77}} What the f**k?

{{champion:106}} HEY! He's mine.
{{champion:58}} No, only the Bear. That was the deal. Turtle was mine.
{{champion:77}} Wtf happened?

{{champion:107}} jeez, what happened?
{{champion:76}} mornin, babe
{{champion:107}} oh crap

{{champion:107}} GET THE FUCK OUT...wait when could you talk?
{{champion:150}} huh? Oh ummm... Gnar gada?
{{champion:107}} I'm serious. Get out, you're not old enough for nudity
{{champion:150}} Jerks....I'm older than all of them...fine, I'll go get Ahri to hug me so I can have my daily inspection...
{{champion:76}} what a Pervy kid, what are you doing today rengar?

{{champion:254}} ...
{{champion:51}} I'm pregnant.
{{champion:254}} ...How?

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UHAtvLfF,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-04-27T17:10:08.693+0000)
>
> {{champion:254}} ...
> {{champion:51}} I'm pregnant.
> {{champion:254}} ...How?

{{champion:126}} "Cannon engaged!"
{{champion:254}} "You sonofa-"
{{champion:126}} "To the skies!"  *Flees.*
Nuuuu, my OTP has been defiled by the Y chromosome!

{{champion:103}} - ugg.  Okay, who are these two chicks next to me? {{champion:89}} {{champion:254}} Did we have a girl's night out or something?
{{champion:103}} - Someone brought a goat?  {{champion:16}} Okay, this is a little weird.
{{champion:103}} - And a snake! {{champion:69}}   I don't even...
{{champion:103}} - Okay, I'm starting to freak out.  I need to wash up and clear my head.  
_Ahri walks to the bathroom, trips over a sleeping {{champion:37}} on the way.  She also notices a {{item:3116}}, a {{item:3151}}, and a {{item:3135}} lying around. At this point that's the least of her concerns.  She opens the door and sees {{champion:161}} sleeping in the tub and {{champion:51}} in handcuffs on the floor_
{{champion:103}} - What the crap happened last night?
{{champion:51}} - I don't know and please don't shout.  Just help me find my keys to unlock these handcuffs and we'll figure that out later.
_One set of keys later, Ahri turns on the TV to get her mind off of things_
{{champion:40}} - Authorities have put a mandatory curfew into effect while police gets this riot under control.  The national guard has been called in and should be arriving later today.  Reports are sketchy, but it seems the riot started as a scuffle between a group of individuals {{champion:36}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:115}} fighting for the love of some mysterious fox-woman of their dreams.  Who she is or if she even exists is unknown, but if you see her you are encouraged to stay away from and call 9-1-1 to let police know about her whereabouts.
{{champion:40}} - The few remaining casinos that are still open are currently putting the over-under for the damages and lost revenue at 120 million if you want to get your bets in.  
{{champion:40}} - On a personal note, if you are out there fox-woman, I can't believe you ran off, we were having so much fun last night!  Please, gimme a call at 555-5262 so I can continue that in-depth interview I was hoping for.
_Ahri turns off the TV._

{{champion:238}} What the hell...
{{champion:84}} You're wild in bed with your shadows.

Vegas would look like Disney World within the next 24 hours.
